titleStmt.title: A proclamation for publishing an act of Parliament, intituled, An Act for the Advancement of the Trade of Linen Manufacture, and for remitting the penalties thereby incurred, and for inlarging several periods of time in the said act contained by the Lord Lieutenant and Council.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crook ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
Given at the Council chamber in Dublin, the 22 day of February, 1666.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
